code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{Home,Trophy,Brain,Plus}from'lucide-react';import LeagueSetupWizard from'../common/LeagueSetupWizard';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Sidebar=()=>{const[isExpanded,setIsExpanded]=useState(false);const[showWizard,setShowWizard]=useState(false);const menuItems=[{title:'Home',path:'/',icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Home,{size:20})},{title:'League',path:'/league',icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Trophy,{size:20})},{title:'Data Science',path:'/data-science',icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Brain,{size:20})}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("aside",{className:`h-screen bg-white fixed top-0 left-0 transition-all duration-300 ${isExpanded?'w-64':'w-16'}`,onMouseEnter:()=>setIsExpanded(true),onMouseLeave:()=>setIsExpanded(false),style:{boxShadow:'2px 0 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"p-4 h-full flex flex-col",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex-1",children:menuItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:item.path,className:"block text-black py-3 px-4 hover:bg-gray-100 rounded transition-all duration-200 flex items-center gap-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"flex-shrink-0",children:item.icon}),isExpanded&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"flex-1",children:item.title})]},item.title))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:()=>setShowWizard(true),className:"w-full py-3 px-4 hover:bg-gray-100 rounded transition-all duration-200 flex items-center gap-4 text-black",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"flex-shrink-0",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Plus,{size:20})}),isExpanded&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"flex-1",children:"Create League"})]})]})}),showWizard&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LeagueSetupWizard,{onClose:()=>setShowWizard(false)})]});};export default Sidebar;
